{
  "recommendations": [
    {
      "campaign_name": "MEN Bold Colors Drop",
      "creative_type": "image",
      "new_headline": "New Colors Just Dropped!",
      "new_message": "Express yourself with our vibrant new range of Bold Colors. Limited stock available!",
      "new_cta": "Shop Now",
      "rationale": "Emphasizing the 'newness' and limited availability can create urgency and increase CTR."
    },
    {
      "campaign_name": "MEN ComfortMax Launch",
      "creative_type": "video",
      "new_headline": "Unleash Ultimate Comfort",
      "new_message": "Introducing ComfortMax: Experience all-day comfort like never before. Shop the launch collection now!",
      "new_cta": "Discover Comfort",
      "rationale": "Highlighting the benefit of 'ultimate comfort' and using a video to showcase the product's features can improve engagement."
    },
    {
      "campaign_name": "MEN Premium Modal",
      "creative_type": "carousel",
      "new_headline": "Elevated Style, Unmatched Softness",
      "new_message": "Experience the luxurious feel of Premium Modal. Explore our collection of sophisticated essentials.",

      "rationale": "Using a carousel to showcase the variety within the Premium Modal collection and emphasizing both style and comfort can attract a wider audience."
    },
    {

      "new_cta": "Shop Signature Soft",
      "rationale": "Directly addressing the 'softness' benefit in the headline and message can resonate with users seeking comfortable clothing."
    },
    {
      "campaign_name": "MEN | ATHLEISURE COOLING",
      "creative_type": "video",
      "new_headline": "Stay Cool, Stay Active",

      "new_cta": "Shop Now",
      "rationale": "Combining the benefits of 'cooling' and 'active' lifestyle in the headline and using a video to demonstrate the product's performance can improve CTR."
    },
    {

      "creative_type": "image",

      "new_message": "Our Cotton Classics collection offers the perfect blend of comfort and style for your everyday wardrobe.",
      "new_cta": "Shop Now",
      "rationale": "Highlighting both 'comfort' and 'style' in the headline can appeal to a broader audience seeking versatile clothing options."
